concept.title: Integration with IBM licence metric tool
concept.shortdesc: Versions of IBM License Metric Tool (ILMT) that support IBM Software License Metric Tag (SLMT) can generate license consumption reports. An ILMT agent can scan in configurable intervals the file system for .slmtag files, collect information, and send it to the corresponding ILMT server. ILMT reports the number of terabytes managed by IBM StoredIQ. This number is to be used as input for the RVU License Conversion Table specified in the license information (li_languagecode file) that comes with IBM StoredIQ. On the application stack, you can find the license information in the License directory.

conbody.p: For more information about using IBM License Metric Tool, see the IBM License Metric Tool documentation.
